# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. It's not just an item; it's an experience. Given its quality and craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $120. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $150. This is a special offer tailored to appreciate your discerning taste and understanding of quality. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly exceptional. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
